S.FORM: Burkina faso Gaga kska Meycow ka Burkina faso, 13 00 N, 2 00 W ka gaga na nniqan. Kana ka knlbangan na o 274,200 sq km (hangan na o Tg75) (knlbanga dxgal o 273,800 sq km, knlbangan qsiya o 400 sq km) . Kana ka sejiqun o niqan 19,512,533 hiyi. Gaga Ouagadougou ka pusu alang paru, jiyax 11 idas 12 ka jiyax skrayan klwaan. Manu ka dxgal Burkina faso ga wada sugan 43.00 ka dxgal qpahan, 20.40 ka dxgal bbuyu, rahuq dxgal do niqan 36.60 na. Bukung klwaan ta sayang o kiya ka Roch Marc Christian Kabor√©, pnaah hngkawas2015 idas 12 jiyax 29pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
